Note: Participant had started recording a video and wanted Meta to stop recording but was waiting for Meta to give auditory signal that it was listening before they said “stop recording” when in reality, Meta is already listening so this is not clear
Participant says that they find the MR glasses more helpful when capturing images send they can see if the object is in frame / exactly what they’re about to send
Participant enjoys how Meta automatically slowly lowers music, pauses when they are sending a message, then slowly turns volume up again
